item.title: ICE Is Getting Unprecedented Access to Medicaid Data
item.description: A new agreement viewed by WIRED gives ICE direct access to a federal database containing sensitive medical data on tens of millions of Americans, with the goal of locating immigrants.

item.title: The FBI's Jeffrey Epstein Prison Video Had Nearly 3 Minutes Cut Out
